Memories of his murdered family lead him to make the case a priority, but he acts on his initiative and leaves HQ without his badge, making DiNozzo fear he is risking his job for a personal vendetta. Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A taxi driver and an admiral working at the Pentagon are found executed by the side of a road, but the agents have trouble ascertaining a motive - until they uncover links to a woman searching for her missing husband, a political refugee from Africa. Meanwhile, McGee makes a discovery about his new girlfriend. Starring Sean Murray, Michael Weatherly and Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby babysits a bright nine-year-old while the other members of the team try to locate the youngster's missing father - a survivalist wanted in connection with a case of robbery and murder. The search takes them deep into the wilderness - where a startling discovery awaits. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Sean Murray

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A traumatised marine escapes from a psychiatric unit, convinced he is still fighting in Iraq. The agents believe his erratic behaviour indicates post-traumatic stress disorder and try to calmly talk him round before restraining him. However, blood tests reveal high levels of steroids in his system - meaning someone is using him as a human lab rat. Starring Lauren Holly, Sean Murray and Cote de Pablo

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard struggle to establish a motive when a woman who adopted 10 children with learning difficulties is murdered. The duo question her husband, who discovered the body, before turning their attention to the youngsters - until information about an affair and the offer of a reality TV appearance sheds light on the case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the death of fashion company owner Sid Maxwell, and question their initial conclusion of asphyxia when they meet photographer Terry Clark. The duo discover a suspicious website after learning Maxwell was using a fake identity

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A wealthy woman is found dead in her apartment, but Lupo and Bernard are quick to dismiss the theory that the killer sought her money. Evidence suggests she was mixing with dangerous figures, among them a cartel, after suitcases filled with cash and drugs are found in the victim's portfolio of properties

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Last-ever episode of the long-running crime drama. When Van Buren discovers a website featuring footage of an alarming amount of explosives, Lupo and Bernard race to find the anonymous blogger who filmed it before his plans to bomb a school are put into action. However, the Department of Education's refusal to take the threat seriously and resistance from the teachers' union complicate the investigation

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Logan uncover hidden motives when a paedophile is murdered on live TV by the father of one of his victims. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Christopher Noth

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs receives a call from his old friend Senator Patrick Kiley, who claims he is being framed for the murder of a naval commander, and seeks help to clear his name. However, incriminating evidence quickly piles up against him - and a second death complicates matters further. Meanwhile, Ziva lets her hair down to obtain fingerprints from a big oil lobbyist. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs revisits his home town to investigate an assault that left one marine dead and another badly injured, and enlists the help of his estranged father to identify the assailant. Suspicion initially falls on a local man whose daughter was dating the survivor of the attack - but later inquiries uncover a tangled tale of uncertain paternity and forbidden love. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Ralph Waite

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine is found murdered in his garage, and inquiries lead the agents to his former sergeant. However, Gibbs and the team soon find out that their man is under FBI witness protection as he is about to testify against a mobster, giving him a cast-iron alibi. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Joe Spano

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The agents face the fury of social media fans when they arrest two popular influencers

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: An American football team's doctor is murdered in his home while his wife is tied up in their bedroom, after arguing with a player who blamed him for a drug scandal. Goren and Eames investigate the couple's preacher, who teaches an extremely tolerant and forgiving approach to adultery, and a member of the church's congregation who evades their questioning. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a six-year-old boy who is believed to have collapsed during an exorcism at a late-night church service. However, forensics reveal the victim was smothered before the rite took place, casting suspicion on his foster parents and social worker. Starring Christopher Meloni, Ice-T and Richard Belzer

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The police discover a 12-year-old boy posted sinister threats to a girl in an internet chatroom and suspect his anger stems from sexual abuse. The trail soon leads Benson and Stabler to a billionaire known for his generous donations to charities and his hospitality to young house guests

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: An aspiring author is murdered, setting in motion an investigation full of unexpected twists and turns. The victim's criminal boyfriend seems a likely suspect, but proves to have a rock-solid alibi - and inquiries later lead Goren and Eames to a celebrated writer whose career has gone into decline. Crime drama, guest starring Peter Coyote, with Vincent D'Onofrio

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Logan and Falacci investigate the murder of a grand jury witness, and uncover serious flaws in the case against a group of American footballers accused of rape. As inquiries proceed, suspicion falls on the motives of an ambitious Bronx assistant DA and his wife, who have a lot riding on the outcome of the trial. Crime drama, starring Chris Noth and Alicia Witt

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The discovery of a child's body sends Stabler and Cragen in search of a suspected paedophile, but important medical evidence emerges that implicates someone close to the child. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Dann Florek

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Muslim US Marine is found seemingly shot dead near a mosque that has been linked to an al-Qaeda recruiter. Ducky refuses to perform an autopsy out of respect for the man's religion, but Abby runs tests that reveal his demise was actually due to poisoning from a rare octopus venom. Meanwhile, McGee goes into the mosque intending to plant a concealed microphone - but discovers someone has had the same idea

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team set up a stake-out at a storage facility to catch a thief suspected of selling hi-tech Navy equipment on the black market, but end up witnessing a murder. To make matters worse, $90million worth of radar gear goes missing while they are distracted. Meanwhile, Ducky asks Abby to run a series of mysterious blood tests, raising suspicions that he is harbouring a secret

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A suspect in a drug-smuggling case is seemingly mauled to death by his own dog, which is immediately scheduled to be destroyed - but Abby refuses to hand it over to Navy officials and launches her own investigation. Meanwhile, Gibbs continues to worry about Shepard's health, convinced she and Ducky are hiding something. Drama, starring Pauley Perrette, Mark Harmon and Lauren Holly

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A traffic collision that resulted in multiple fatalities is seemingly caused by a drink driver, but that theory is dismissed as Lupo and Bernard's investigation gets under way. The detectives discover a nasal spray that has been spiked to disorient its user and learn a pharmaceutical company worker was intending to disclose sensitive details about her employer - so the duo try to track down her boss

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A key witness in a murder trial is found dead outside her hotel room, and Lupo and Bernard's investigation embroils them in a conspiracy involving black-market dealings, drug cartels and corrupt officials. With the lives of other witnesses in danger, Rubirosa finds herself caught in the crossfire

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Lupo and Bernard investigate when a community activist is murdered. Meanwhile, Van Buren gets bad news from former detective Ray Curtis. Police drama, starring Jeremy Sisto, Anthony Anderson and S Epatha Merkerson

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A harmless tramp is attacked by an over-zealous vigilante and left for dead in a deserted alley, sending Briscoe and Logan in pursuit of his assailant. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Christopher Noth

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A famous rock star is acquitted of raping a fan after the victim's claims are rejected. Logan and Briscoe decide to investigate further, and discover the musician's pleasant reputation does not quite match his personality. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A serial killer begins posting footage of his crimes online - and as the agents investigate, they realise that each film contains visual clues to the identity of the next victim. In a further bizarre twist, Abby later finds what seems to be a new video on her computer - and the case takes on fresh urgency with the discovery that it is actually a live feed, suggesting the murderer is somewhere on the premises

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bank at Quantico is robbed and a security guard killed, but the team soon discovers that stealing money may not have been the perpetrators' primary objective. Meanwhile, Gibbs is given the task of evaluating an inexperienced new agent assigned by Vance to help investigate the case. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Rey Valentin

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs sends DiNozzo and Ziva to retrieve top-secret information from a secure military base - a mission aimed at catching a mole in the NCIS ranks. Unfortunately, it soon becomes clear that the traitor is still at large - so the building is locked down and all agents are rounded up in a final effort to catch the culprit. Guest starring Jude Ciccolella

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team struggles to locate a suspect following the murder of an eight-year-old boy whose body is found on a hiking trail in Pennsylvania. As the case develops and the number of victims increases, two more children go missing in the same area, and the agents work quickly to stop the pair becoming the killer's next targets

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU is sent to Las Cruces, New Mexico, to investigate a series of murders within a gated community. Three women have been strangled in the past two months, and when the team discovers that no non-residents were present at the time of the last killing, they employ FBI agent Ashley Seaver to root out the criminal

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney is found strangled in his car in an area notorious for prostitution. Benson is shocked to realise she briefly dated the victim and refuses to believe he would have paid for sex. As investigations get under way, DNA evidence reveals the dead man might have been gay. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The rape and murder of a criminology student puts detectives Stabler and Benson on the trail of a killer with an expert knowledge of forensics. A discovery about the victim's mentor places him at the top of their list of suspects - but as further evidence is gathered, it begins to seem that someone might have tried to frame him for the crime

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren infiltrates the psychiatric ward of a New York jail, without the knowledge of his superiors, to investigate disturbing allegations by his inmate nephew that prisoners are being systematically abused, tortured and even killed by sadistic guards. Drama, starring Vincent d'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: While investigating the execution-style killing of three college students on a basketball court, Logan struggles to understand what appears to be a motiveless triple murder. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A fugitive sex offender kidnaps his accuser, leading Detectives Benson and Stabler to question the man's dying mother to discover where he is heading. programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: Representatives from a dying planet meet members of the Moonbase Alpha crew, and offer some of them a chance to return to Earth. Sci-fi adventure, starring Martin Landau and Barbara Bain

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: A reconstruction of Pakistan International Airlines Flight 8303, which was near the end of its 90-minute journey from Lahore to Karachi when it dramatically crashed on May 22, 2020

programme.title: Terry and Mason's Great Food Trip
programme.desc: Terry Wogan and Mason McQueen arrive in the Roman city of Bath, where they seek out the finest delicacies, from beetroot sorbet to honey glazed dormice. A reviving brew served by the UK's reigning king of the baristas sets them up for a visit to the catacombs where an eco food initiative is making mushrooms out of waste cardboard and coffee grounds

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Monroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of this amazing city that normally lie undiscovered

programme.title: Castle Builders
programme.desc: How castles fared under attack, featuring the story of Bad King John and one of the bloodiest sieges in English history

programme.title: The Big Knife (1955)
programme.desc: An unscrupulous studio executive will go to any lengths to keep a movie star on contract, even threatening to expose his part in a hit and run incident. The actor relents and a cover-up is prepared, but to keep the secret buried, criminal actions are required. Drama, starring Jack Palance, Rod Steiger and Ida Lupino

programme.title: We Are the Lambeth Boys
programme.desc: Members of the Alford House Youth Club in Kennington, London, are seen at school, work and taking part in the club's activities, in this look at youth culture in the 1950s

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Coastal Railways with Julie Walters
programme.desc: The actress travels on the famous Great Western Railway to Cornwall. She recalls childhood holidays when she stops at Torquay before heading to a supposedly haunted castle at Kingswear. She also uncovers tales of smuggling and joins members of the RNLI on a practice run before visiting an unusual cake shop in Penzance

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: A woman who witnesses gangsters disposing of a body flees in terror. Mannering is enlisted to track her down and obtain her statement

programme.title: Cat Hospital

programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: Wilt (1989)
programme.desc: An unlucky lecturer with idle fantasies of killing his wife finds himself in a compromising position with an inflatable sex doll. His efforts to dispose of it land him in trouble when his wife subsequently disappears, and an obsessive detective becomes convinced he has murdered her and been seen disposing of the body. Comedy based on Tom Sharpe's novel, starring Griff Rhys Jones, Mel Smith and Alison Steadman

programme.desc: Documentary exploring areas of the capital, beginning with Shooters Hill, Charlton, Greenwich and Blackheath

programme.title: The Long Firm
programme.desc: Joe Penhall's four-part adaptation of Jake Arnott's critically acclaimed novel, capturing the seedy side of the criminal underworld in 1960s London, as seen through the eyes of four characters who come into contact with charismatic nightclub owner Harry Starks. Drama, starring Mark Strong, Derek Jacobi and Israel Aduramo

programme.title: Forget Me Not (2011)
programme.desc: A musician comes to the aid of a barmaid being accosted by a drunk. Together they go on a journey around London and begin to fall in love, but as the night draws to a close, a secret threatens to bring their fledgling relationship to an end before it has begun. Romantic drama, with Tobias Menzies and Genevieve O'Reilly

programme.title: Buster (1988)
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama about the life of Buster Edwards, a member of the gang responsible for the Great Train Robbery. Going on the run after the notorious heist, he flees to Mexico with his family. However, his homesick wife struggles to adapt to her new life, leaving the outlaw with a difficult choice. Starring Phil Collins, Julie Walters, Sheila Hancock, Larry Lamb and Ralph Brown

The young man begins a passionate affair with his stepmother, but is consumed with guilt for betraying his father. programme.title: EFL Cup Retro
programme.desc: Manchester United v Tottenham Hotspur in the 2008/09 final. Spurs were managed by Harry Redknapp and had a strong run that led them to the final of the competition, having beaten the likes of Newcastle, Liverpool and Watford in previous rounds. The Red Devils had beaten Middlesbrough, Queens Park Rangers and Blackburn Rovers in the early rounds, before beating Derby County 4-3 on aggregate
